mapper.select:
select COUNT(*) from cmd_table where c_flag=1
AND ${page.name} LIKE CONCAT(#{page.value},'%')
mapper.sql: c_id, c_cmd, c_request, c_response, c_describle, c_flag
mapper.insert:
insert into cmd_table
c_id,
c_cmd,
c_request,
c_response,
c_describle,
c_flag,

mapper.update:
update cmd_table
c_cmd = #{cCmd,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
c_request = #{cRequest,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
c_response = #{cResponse,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
c_describle = #{cDescrible,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
c_flag = #{cFlag,jdbcType=INTEGER},
where c_id = #{cId,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update cmd_table set c_cmd = #{cCmd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, c_request = #{cRequest,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, c_response = #{cResponse,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, c_describle = #{cDescrible,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, c_flag = #{cFlag,jdbcType=INTEGER} where c_id = #{cId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
